response.overview: "Murli" is a person, who has sexual problem. Who does not consider himself a man, because of which he does not want to get married. But due to family pressure, Murli has to get married... After marriage there is an earthquake in his life. He always runs away from wife. In his dark life, his wife "Geeta" brings a new light of hope. But even with Geeta's efforts, Murli cannot be cured... After that Geeta along with a sexologist. Takes such a step, which is not easy for a woman... To have sexual intercourse with other man in front of Murali....
response.title: Tumse Na Hoga
